TutorialStoryScene_PokemonGet_Content_Ti: You’ve got yourself a new friend!
TutorialStoryScene_PokemonGet_Dialog_Con:
Starting today, this Pikachu will
aid you in your research! Why not
start by giving him a nickname?
TutorialSetupSceneController_Text_7:
Let’s set a goal for when you and
Pikachu should hit the hay each day
in order to do your sleep research.
If you get to bed by the bedtime you
set for yourself, you’ll earn a reward!
